title: When will a Japanese rulebook be published?
body:
{{champion:17}} Hello.
I am a Japanese summoner.
I am usually playing with a Japanese server.
English is not very good at it.
I wanted to play Mechs vs Minions and bought it through an import agent.

Because the rule is English, it took me half a year to translate the tutorial into Japanese.
Are you planning to publish a Japanese version of the rule book?
I want to play with Japanese rule book.

http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/cottontail_teemo/imgs/5/b/5bfae978.jpg
http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/cottontail_teemo/imgs/9/8/98d1a509.jpg
http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/cottontail_teemo/imgs/8/1/81bad944.jpg
http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/cottontail_teemo/imgs/9/d/9daf816a.jpg
http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/cottontail_teemo/imgs/9/d/9daf816a.jpg
http://livedoor.blogimg.jp/cottontail_teemo/imgs/7/0/7088f224.jpg

Or I will try harder to translate even if it takes time
I want image data such as command cards other than missions and rules.
I want to make a translated card while watching English in images

I also post on the board of Japan server
https://boards.jp.leagueoflegends.com/ja-jp/c/community-event/LlcA9EHR-naeeilolzauiiii-mecs-vs-minionsziieiiitcisoeutsi


Everything is google translate sentences, but thanks for reading :)

replies.body: Very impressive stuff! Unfortunately I can't give an exact date (because we're not really sure of the time table ourselves), but we are looking into getting all the dossiers and rulebook materials translated into Japanese soon. We'll make them available on the website where you can download the other translated versions.

Thank you.
Please order that you translate it to Japanese Rioter as soon as possible
Must have been very time consuming translating this using only Google!
I made it because I like it even if it takes time

First of all - looks pretty impressive, so good job.

Second of all, it's nice to see another Teemo main (at least I assume you are a Teemo main) who also happens to love this game. ^_^

But as far as translation goes - have you looked for a fan translation? Or maybe asked if there's someone who would do it (I reckon english is a popular language even in Japan, so it's possible the translation already exists)?

There are probably ten people who have Mechs vs Minions in Japan.
Because I have to purchase from the NA Riot Store.
Most Japanese give up on overseas mail order.
There are really many Summoners who are not good at English.

So people who can speak English will not be able to play board games, so I will not translate them.

Oh, I see.

It's a real pity in this case. :/

If this is purely google translated it is insanely good (for google standards).

Btw, why was this downvoted? Upvote it so he/she can get an answer.
I got an answer from Rioter. Thank you!
